title: Privacy Policy - Calkilo AI Calorie Calculator App
description: Calkilo Privacy Policy - Learn how we protect your personal data and health information in our AI-powered calorie calculator app. GDPR and CCPA compliant.

content.intro: At Calkilo, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our AI-powered calorie calculator mobile application ("App") and related services.

personalInfo.title: 1.1 Personal Information
personalInfo.description: We may collect the following types of personal information:

items.accountInfo: Account Information: Email address, username, and password when you create an account
items.profileInfo: Profile Information: Age, gender, height, weight, activity level, and health goals
items.healthData: Health Data: Food photos, calorie counts, nutritional information, and dietary preferences
items.usageData: Usage Data: App usage patterns, features used, and interaction data
items.deviceInfo: Device Information: Device type, operating system, unique device identifiers, and IP address

howWeUse.title: 2. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: We use your information for the following purposes:

items.coreServices: Core Services: To provide AI-powered calorie calculation and nutrition tracking
items.personalization: Personalization: To customize your experience and provide relevant recommendations
items.improvement: Improvement: To enhance our AI algorithms and app functionality
items.communication: Communication: To send you important updates, notifications, and support
items.analytics: Analytics: To understand usage patterns and improve our services
items.legalCompliance: Legal Compliance: To comply with applicable laws and regulations

dataSecurity.title: 3. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement industry-standard security measures to protect your information:

items.encryption: Encryption: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using AES-256 encryption
items.accessControls: Access Controls: Strict access controls and authentication protocols
items.regularAudits: Regular Audits: Regular security audits and vulnerability assessments
items.secureInfrastructure: Secure Infrastructure: Hosted on secure, SOC 2 compliant cloud infrastructure

items.2: Delete your account and associated data
items.3: Export your data in a portable format
items.4: Opt-out of certain data processing activities

contactUs.title: 5. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us:
contactUs.address: Address: Calkilo Privacy Team, 123 Health Tech Street, San Francisco, CA 94105
